edu.ncsu.csc216.flix_2.rental_system

Interface RentalManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DVDRentalSystem

    public interface RentalManager
    Interface for a rental system where the items for rent are stored in an inventory and where there are different customers. Items can be reserved, checked out for home, and returned to the inventory. Items in the the inventory, reserves, and at home can be located by position.
    Author:
    Jo Perry

        Reserve the selected item for the reserve queue.

        position - position of the selected item in the inventory
